input_args.passage: 'Orkworld | Orkworld is a fantasy role-playing game featuring orks. It was designed by John Wick, illustrated by Thomas Denmark and released by Wicked Press.'
input_args.claim: 'The only genre they have in common is that they are both categorized within the broader scope of role-playing, with "Orkworld" being a role-playing game and "John Wick" being a character within a media franchise that has role-playing elements.'
